Subject: Cantera short course or workshop?
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=44728387
X-Yahoo-Profile: dggoodwin

It occurs to me that many Cantera users will be in Chicago this July 
for the 30th Combustion Symposium.  I will be there too.  If there is 
interest among User's Group members, it might be possible to hold an 
informal short course or workshop on using Cantera for combustion 
simulations in conjunction with the Symposium.  I would envision 
something short - perhaps just one morning or one afternoon.   If you 
think you might be interested in this, let me know.

Dave
